title: I Pitches
stimulusHtml:
16 points

Pitches (16 points)

  1. Award 1 point for each correctly notated pitch. Do not consider duration.

  2. Award full credit for octave transpositions of the correct bass pitch.

  3. No enharmonic equivalents are allowed.

title: II Chord Symbols
stimulusHtml:
Chord Symbols (8 points)

  1. Award 1 point for each chord symbol correct in both Roman and Arabic numerals.

  2. Award ½ point for each correct Roman numeral that has incorrect or missing Arabic numerals.

  3. Accept the correct Roman numeral regardless of its case.

  4. Accept any symbol that means “of” or “applied” at Chord Four (e.g., V/vi, [V], V→vi, V of vi)

  5. Accept capital III for the Roman numeral of Chord Four.

title: III Special Scoring Issues
stimulusHtml:
III Special Scoring Issues

Round any fractional score upto the next higher points (Exception: Round 23 1/2 DOWN to 23 points)

0 Score for responses that represent an unsuccessful attempt to answer the question

- - Score for blank or irrelavant responses
descriptions:
III Special Scoring Issues

Round any fractional score upto the next higher points (Exception: Round 23 1/2 DOWN to 23 points)

0 Score for responses that represent an unsuccessful attempt to answer the question

- - Score for blank or irrelavant responses
